title: New Release Scheduled
message: Version 3.2 is scheduled for release on November 15th. Please complete all regression testing by November 10th.

title: Team Meeting - Sprint Planning
message: Sprint planning meeting scheduled for November 1st at 10 AM. All team members are required to attend.

title: New Test Environment Available
message: A new staging environment is now available for integration testing. Check the servers page for details.
